as.description: The element or component the Combobox.Option should render as.
as.description_zh: The element or component the Combobox.Option should render as.

:active.description: Whether or not the option is the active/focused option.
:active.description_zh: Whether or not the option is the active/focused option.

:selected.description: Whether or not the option is the selected option.
:selected.description_zh: Whether or not the option is the selected option.

:disabled.description:
Whether or not the option is the disabled for keyboard navigation and ARIA
purposes.
:disabled.description_zh:
Whether or not the option is the disabled for keyboard navigation and ARIA
purposes.
